paper_abstract: This paper describes the method of calculation of the eigenvalues, eigenvectors of the Jacobian matrix of the Euler equations augmented by the convective part of k-omega turbulence model. The equations are 3D and values are expressed in terms of cell normals of a finite volume. The expressions for wave strengths are also found, which are also necessary to calculate the inter-cell fluxes for Roe's scheme. Copyright (c) 2007 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: Roe linearization for the Euler equations augmented by the convective terms from the k-omega turbulence model
